CustomField.formula: IF($RecordType.Name = "OE Complex","OEM", CASE(Type_of_Opportunity__c, "R&O – Components","R&O", "R&O – APU","R&O", "R&O – Wheels and Brakes","R&O", "Spares – LRUs","LRU", "RMUs – Avionics","RMU CA", "RMUs – Mechanical Upgrades","RMU CA", "Connectivity Solutions","RMU CA", "Error"))
CustomField.label: SIP OrderType
